title: Huawei Tech Connect 2024, a commercial market event to target SMEs for Pakistan’s South region
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 13 (APP):Huawei Technologies Pakistan has successfully executed Huawei Tech connect 2024, said a press release issued on Thursday.
This event was focused on bringing Digital Transformation to the SME sector of Pakistan, revolutionizing the way organizations operate with a steadfast approach towards improving the ICT landscape of Pakistan.
The cross-Industry event focused on tackling IT infrastructure challenges of various sectors including Education, Pharma, Energy, Banks, Real Estate, HealthCare and Retail.
The event has given industry related experts to share their insights, interact and network with one another to discuss modern world technology challenges and how Huawei’s cutting edge solutions can make organizations stay one step ahead of them.
Over 100+ customers participated, representing a broad spectrum of industries.AlsoHigh-profile attendees, including C-level customers from key organizations were present. Huawei Pakistan Showcased Huawei’s latest solutions, attracting and retaining the interest of attendees. The successful event facilitated meaningful connections between participants, leading to potential collaborations and business growth.
While talking at the Event Shahzad Ahmed, Director IT – UIT stated on the occasion that:“It was a good event in a way that we got to know about Huawei’s offerings in the field of Storage and Network technologies. It was an amazing opportunity to connect with fellow industry experts and share insights about where the industry is headed w.r.t IT infrastructure landscape. Being from Education Industry, we’re interested in Huawei’s IP portfolio especially switches and access points”.
